DOC.brief_summary: This open-label, randomized, two-period, two-treatment (single doses of 7.5 mg hetrombopag fasted or fed), crossover study was conducted to evaluate the effect of a high-fat meal on the pharmacokinetics of hetrombopag and mass balance study in 12 healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of a High-fat Meal on the Pharmacokinetics of Hetrombopag and Mass Balance Study in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy. Weight≥50 kg，19≤BMI≤28 kg/m2. Platelet count is within normal range History of clinically significant illness. History of alcohol or drug abuse.
